title: Altera Quaruts II v8.0 with License
description:
- : Altera Quartus II v8.0 : -

Release Date: 
         
    03/08/2008

Package Info:

This torrent contains Altera&#039;s Quartus II software for designing and programing 
Programmable Logic Devices with the VHDL and Verilog languages.

Supported Windows Operating Systems:

    ~ Microsoft Windows Vista (32-bit and 64-bit)
    ~ Microsoft Windows XP (32-bit and 64-bit)
    ~ Microsoft Windows 2000

Installation and Licencing Instructions:
 
 1. Install Quartus II with the supplemented software.

 2. a~ After the installation finishes, load the dir in which you installed the
       software (the default directory is: C:Altera80).
    b~ In the "quartus" dir, open the folder "Bin" and search for the file
       "sys_cpt.dll", rename the file and add a ".bak" extension to it so the
       renamed file will look like this: "sys_cpt.dll.bak".
    c~ Redo the steps in section &#039;b&#039; for the folder "Bin64".
    d~ Copy the files "sys_cpt.dll" to their respective folders in the Quartus
       installation dir (i.e.: "C:Altera80quartus") from "The-DuckBin" and
       from "The-DuckBin64".
    e~ Copy the license file "alteralicense.dat" to the Quartus installation dir.
       "C:Altera80quartus".

 3. Launch Quartus II, after it loads, it will give you a 3 option "Evaluation
    Mode" dialog concerning the licensing of the software. Choose "Specify valid
    license file" and click "OK".

 4. Locate your NIC ID "Network Interface Card ID" (12 digits) at the lower part
    of the "License Setup" form that opened and copy it.

 5. Edit the license file "alteralicense.dat" with Notepad. Find (Ctrl+F) and
    replace each "############" (there should be 17 of those) with your own NIC ID.

 6. Specify your new license file by clicking the "..." button in the "License
    Setup" form and browsing to your Quartus installation dir. 

 7. Verify that the license was recived successfully by looking at the "Licensed
    AMPP/MegaCore functions:" table under the "Version" column and verifying that
    the value for the entire list is "2020.03" then press the "OK" button.

     Your Quartus should now be licensed until March 2020, hope thats enough~

           If not, try retrying the instructins or posting a comment on 
          <a href=" http://thepiratebay.se/user/The-Duck" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://thepiratebay.se/user/The-Duck</a> under the respective torrent.

The-Duck&#039;s General Comments:

   - The &#039;b&#039; and &#039;c&#039; parts under section &#039;2&#039; are only for making a backup of the
     ".dll"s.

   - If you need any help please post as a comment on The Pirate Bay under this
     torrent.

   - These files DO NOT contain any Spy/Adware nor any Trojans, Worms and Viruses!
     IF you find any post them, BUT check you computer first for any pre-infection
     that might explain the situation !

   - To all those who wonder why I didn&#039;t compress the files: I wanted to give
     people who only wants the license and ".dll"s the option to get them without
     downloading the entire setup.

   - PLEASE SEED, and leave comments on any problems you might have concerning
     installation or bittorent realated under this torrent. 

      You can find the torrent here: http://thepiratebay.se/user/The-Duck

              The-Duck [ http://thepiratebay.se/user/The-Duck ]
